name: When the Loraks is Armed
description:
When the Loraks is Armed - a game for Voidsay

I made a top down rouge litey shooter in like 2 weeks for the 2021 Secret Santa Jam. It lacks a bitof polish, and like, 2 acts, and also a boss from the end of act I, but hey, it shipped! Maybe I will revisit it in the future. 

-------------------------------

When the people from Castle Moneybags kidnap all the critters in the forest for purposes too gruesome to write down here, its on Loraks, the Forest Guardian, to take their trusty blaster and save the day. 

-------------------------------

Controls:

WASD to move

LMB to shoot

RMB to dodge

R to reload

F to interact

SPACE to use active ability (when applicable)
